attributes.action: Increase the Royal Navy's presence in the South Atlantic and to send a strong message that the Falklands are British, inhabitted by British and that we will not given in to bullying.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that we should increase the Royal Navy's presence in the South Atlantic in order that the Argentines are send a strong message. Further, i believe that there should be strong behnind the scenes work to bring US power and influence to support its main ally, which has paid with so much of our own blood and money supporting their defence of their homeland. 

There should be a resolution of the security council to resolve this matter once and for all in the favour of the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
